website_summaries.verdict: An affordable option that offers comparable quality to more costly competitors. The best choice available if you want to save a little money on a snorkel set.
pros: Mask features a low-profile design that is comfortable and lightweight on the face — provides a wide view
Most users don't have issues with leaks
Dry top snorkel works well at preventing water back flow
cons: The mask occasionally fogs up — may require an anti-fog spray
A bit pricey, considering fins are not included with the set

customer_reviews.title: and I am happy with my
customer_reviews.text: I tested the googles, and yes they do fog. However, After scrubbing the glass with some plain white toothpaste, and spraying a mix of baby shampoo and water, The googles did not fog up while I was in the water. I used the goggles around 1 hour per session and I was ok each time as long as I sprayed the mixture onto the googles before getting in the water :) The item seems made well, and I am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Foreverjaded

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mask and snorkel
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny... Excellent mask and snorkel... The snorkel water bobber & purge works perfectly... Any problems with fogging can be mitigated by either scrubbing the inside lens with toothpaste and/or baby/kids shampoo however burning off the manufacture process that leaves a film of silicone on the lens is the fogging problem in which you have to remove... And burning it off is one method that I mastered and everyone should please take note that it may damage the seal inside the lens however this process works best for me .
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not use in salt water!
customer_reviews.text: I recently took my snorkel set to the British Virgin Islands for sailing and snorkeling. On the third day of snorkeling we went ashore on a sandy spit of land for half an hour. When we got back in the water the “bobber” that keeps the snorkel dry was completely stuck - in a position that let me exhale but not inhale at all (presumably sand or other particulate in the salt water jammed it up). We tried a number of things to free it but to no avail - until we returned to the boat and used some toothpicks to move the bobber and dental floss to keep the airway open for future snorkels.
customer_reviews.author: Indiana Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Great mask fits my face perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Read alot of reviews and step 1 to this mask is baking soda and soap scrub down. Step 2 is baby shampoo before you get in the water. After that i had 0 issues with fogging. Have had this out several times now in florida and on our cruise in 4 ports. Great fov, comfortable on my face and i had no issues with leaks down to 30 ft. Spent on avg over an hour in the water each trip. Easy to pinch my nose and clear the ears. Well worth every penny. Hard to beat when paired with the cressi snorkel.
customer_reviews.author: David Myers

customer_reviews.title: Mask fogs up
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this snorkel/mask set for snorkeling local reefs & to use for exercise when I do laps in the ocean & pool. I love the snorkel as it doesn't allow water into it when you go underwater & I can breath without worring about taking in water. Huge plus! I like the clear color, the smaller size mask, suction is good, however unfortunately the mask fogs up instantly! I've tried everything that you are suppose to do to prep the mask. But it still fogs up, therefore I can't see a thing. So I will likely return. Unless someone from the company can give me feedback & has any recommendations!?
customer_reviews.author: Lynn K

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit but mask fogs badly
customer_reviews.text: Mask fogs readily despite commonly used methods to defog that work well for cheaper masks. After failing to clear using tried-and-true methods such as spit and using crushed Hawaiian Naupaka leaves, I tried toothpaste and then even followed instructions for burning off any manufacturing residue but to no avail. The mask fogs instantly every time. Maybe commercial defogging drops/spray will work, but I've never had trouble using the other methods on any other mask. Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan H Plissner

customer_reviews.title: Best swim snorkel ever!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this snorkel. The mask adheres to my face well and doesn't leak. The snorkel works great and also doesn't leak and the "water stopper" feature at the end of the snorkel works well. I hesitated to buy this because it seemed spendy. But others at my pool raved about this same snorkel and told me it was worth it, so I bought this one. Very pleased with the purchase. So far, pool chemicals, sun, salt water and wear and tear have not resulted in the materials cracking or leaking or the "grip" of the face mask loosening. Over time, the lens of the mask has become slightly foggy but its not bad .
customer_reviews.author: zamba

customer_reviews.title: REALLY FOGS UP! BAD!!!
customer_reviews.text: As many other buyers have noted this mask fogs up almost instantly even with a good seal and no leaks. We even did a thorough cleaning with toothpaste before first use and used defogger but still fog. Seller will only refund 50% plus you have to pay for return shipping despite the fact that their item does not function properly. So when is all said and done you may get $12 back on your $40 purchase. Not worth the return. Would have gave 0 star if it was an option. On the plus side the snorkel is great so I guess I basically paid $40 for it because I will have to find another mask.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: this one was perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this mask for our 9 year old son to use while vacationing and it fit him very well. He had used a mask that they provide at Discovery Cove a couple days before this one, and there was no comparison, this one was perfect in every way. It fit well, didn't suck out his eyeballs in order to not leak, and was very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Stinger72

customer_reviews.title: Seals good, lacks peripheral
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take snorkeling in the Caribbean near Cancun. The color is not good but the black version of it is not available anywhere. I liked the way it worked. It leaked very little to none most of the time and I have a short trimmed mustache. I wasn't crazy about the lack of peripheral vision but knew it lacked that when I bought it. I bought it for the low profile and because it was highly reviewed. It did work well and I will use it again but it was not worthy of a 5 star rating. The snorkel was great.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Great Mask
customer_reviews.text: I tried out a few masks for snorkeling. I have a beard and it's a bit hard to find a mask that is comfortable but maintains a seal. I tried out a Scuba Pro, Kraken and a few other masks. I like the Scuba Pro a little more than this Cressi mask but the Cressi is half the price. I had to treat it with a lighter and apply soap each time I go so it doesn't fog up. I think this is the best mask you can get for a low price.
customer_reviews.author: MrMr

customer_reviews.title: The fit was nice and snug both for my face and my husband's
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my husband and I to take on a recent vacation. I even had an opportunity to compare this one with one of those masks that cover your nose. I much preferred the Cressi mask. I prepped the glass with baby shampoo, so had no fogging issues. The fit was nice and snug both for my face and my husband's. I felt it was worth the slightly higher cost to get a better quality product.
customer_reviews.author: katismom

customer_reviews.title: these things are great! well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love these things! fit perfectly, rarely ever let water in the visor area. the snorkel worked great, wish it was a little longer, as the sudden stopage of air when it submerges can give you a shock when you didnt feel you had put your head too far down. snorkel doesnt drop in the water when you move, and its position can be easily adjusted if it does become a problem. i would strongly suggest getting some kind of defogger though. these will fog up and sometimes spitting in them doesnt do the trick. the defogger made a world of difference for me, as i was constantly coming up to wipe them. in the end, a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Great Snorkel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mask and snorkel set for a dive trip in Cancun. I highly recommend the dry snorkel. The mask had a bit of a fogging issue. I used anti fog gel and baby shampoo. The mask worked better after the baby shampoo. I have not yet used toothpaste on the mask. Keep in mind that you may need to do a good scrubbing of the mask before you use it on a dive trip
customer_reviews.author: MCB

customer_reviews.title: Seals where others leak
customer_reviews.text: What's a mask have to do? Not leak. Pretty much every basic other function isn't a problem with any mask on the market, but oh, so many leak, even if I push them on my slightly large face, inhale and have them seem to seal. What's the difference with this mask? I'm pretty sure it's about an eighth of an inch wider on the flange where it seals. That's it, that's all, but it made my snorkel and dive vacay a total success.
customer_reviews.author: toobeayu

customer_reviews.title: Fogger
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful set, but it did fog on me. I took it to Key West. I pretreated with that spit brand of defogger, it still fogged. Our guide on the boat treated it with his own formula and it still fogged like crazy. I was considering returning it but I think it may have been too tight so I will try again next time we go snorkeling.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I grabbed these for a two week trip to hawaii. We had originally purchased a all in one face mask but I felt like I should of grabbed these as well. The all in one would not allow us to breathe well, but these worked as intended. I highly recommend bringing some baby shampoo and using a little bit of it mixed with water to create a solution to stop these from fogging up. I was able to snorkel with dolphins, a shark and plenty of sea turtles. Also the all in one snorkels still fog up
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Great value and excellent performance
customer_reviews.text: Great value and excellent performance. !0 times better than rental gear. Took these on a month long trip through C. America and glad i did. Be aware that you'll need to burn off the invisible film that coats the lenses from the factory, using a lighter etc.. Following it up with a good scrub down with no grit toothpaste and a rinse in water. Prior to getting in the water you'll want to spray the insides with a solution of baby shampoo and water ( a 50/50 solution works fine) and dip the mask in the ocean a few times . If they still fog up, spit in them and then dip them again.
customer_reviews.author: GoofyFoot

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: These F1 is super high quality! I was impressed considering how affordable they are. I like how the glass sits close to your face so there isn’t much air volume for when you dive deep. Also it’s the most comfortable mask I have ever worn. The strap adjustment buttons make it super easy to adjust the strap when it is on your face. The plastic and silicone seem high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chino

customer_reviews.title: this was the perfect snorkel for our vacation
customer_reviews.text: this was the perfect snorkel for our vacation. I LOVED the float and the way it worked while snorkeling in choppy waters. I ordered a few more for the kids to use this summer at the lake. This is a fantastic set. **** you will have to season it before you use it though, it fogs up something fierce. you tube it. ****
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Good mask, snorkel valve gets stuck
customer_reviews.text: Bought a few of these for our family. The mask is good - fits well and did not leak. However, the "dry" snorkel has issues - the valve at the top gets stuck often. If it's stuck in the down position, you may get water coming through the snorkel (no longer "dry"). If it gets stuck at the top, it's worse - you will not get any air to breathe! And it's hard to move the valve once it gets stuck.
customer_reviews.author: CandyR

customer_reviews.title: Solid seal and Snorkel
customer_reviews.text: I have a beard, so most masks leak. Bought this one hoping a little "seal" around the nose/Mustashe would work. It did! Didn't know, was how the Supernova Dry snorkel made breathing easier. Sorry, no fun with a leaking mask and spitting salt water trying get the mask cleared back on. I'm happy
customer_reviews.author: FoodNut

customer_reviews.title: All my friends want to use my mask and snorkel..
customer_reviews.text: This mask is great. I use it for SCUBA diving and snorkeling, and the mask is so comfortable that any of my friends who borrow it want to keep using it. So I send them to Amazon! The mask has good visibility and forms a great seal. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Monahan

customer_reviews.title: Best snorkel/mask out there
customer_reviews.text: Having tried lots of masks, there is nothing better than the Cressi. Period. No matter your face shape, these are just the best masks. I prefer the darker colors as the material feels more flexible. The brown with a red neoprene cover on the back is actually pretty sharp. The fish will dig it.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun O.

customer_reviews.title: Face mask shattered
customer_reviews.text: This is a tough review to write considering this set performed well on several recent snorkeling excursions during our cruise. The tough part is that I was surprised when I opened my suitcase to discover the mask had shattered! What was equally surprising is that other fragile items right next to it (perfume bottle, glass souvenirs) were perfectly intact with no damage. I can only surmise the plastic in the face mask was not great quality. Really disappointing considering I would have otherwise given this 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun Snorkel Set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these during the summer and had a blast with them. They fit nice and the lenses are pretty clear after a wash of soap water. Everything feels very solid and like it will last a while. I like that I got the bright colors because my friends can spot me when they swim out. The snorkel itself is very nice and I've never had a problem with water getting in. The mast feels great and is a softer kind of material. I bought the cressi mask pad and it made the mask perfect. I would buy this again and have recommended it to other friends. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennette Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Snorkeling Set
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I purchased two sets of the mask and snorkel for a recent trip and were very pleased with the quality compared to other sets we've used in the past. The skirt to the mask is very comfortable and fits without leaking in the slightest. The mask is also relatively low volume, so the vision is great and no problems with pressurization. We were both impressed with the snorkel. Other "dry top" snorkels we've had were mostly dry, but this was a completely dry version. There was no entry of water in multiple conditions of snorkeling.
customer_reviews.author: rce610

customer_reviews.title: The best thing I've ever bought before a vacation.
customer_reviews.text: Great value! I've paid twice as much for snorkeling gear and only been half as happy with it. The mask is good quality, and mine didn't leak whatsoever. The snorkel mouthpiece was small enough that it didn't make my mouth feel sore, even after several hours on the reef. The tube was easy to clear following a free dive. I happily logged about 16 hours of snorkeling in one week in Mexico this summer with zero problems. If only I could say the same about my fins. They are U.S. Diver, the cheapest ones they make. I am considering trying the Cressi fins now, since the snorkel set was such a resounding success.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Darden

customer_reviews.title: Good mask for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Plain stupid simple mask that when treated properly works better for my face than several other masks that cost much more. I like that the price is quite fair for these (even though its gone up since I bought my first one). I like that I can purchase 2 of these for the same price as the masks I replaced with these.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Howard

customer_reviews.title: Fog-O-Matic 500's.
customer_reviews.text: This thing couldn't be on my face for more than 30 seconds before it fogged completely over and making me practically blind. Spit, wipes, absolutely nothing helped! It's not like we were in cold water with a warm mask, we were in the Caribbean sea with water temps in the 80's. I was so mad with them I wanted to toss them in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bremner

customer_reviews.title: This snorkeling set has transformed my swimming!
customer_reviews.text: This snorkeling set has transformed my swimming! It's comfortable and works great, totally water-tight. It took a little getting used to at first (breathing through the mouth instead of nose), but once I got used to it it has been fantastic. I am able to swim many more laps now. And I don't like to get pool water in my mouth or nose and this product prevents any water from getting in.
customer_reviews.author: Portia Iversen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a trip to the beach.
customer_reviews.text: It not pro grade equipment but for forays to the beach it's perfect. Fits well and the snorkel is legit. Wide field of view is great for checking in and around the rocks for cool stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Baron Von Nobzez

customer_reviews.title: Way better than what Target sells
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to buy this since I thought silicone masks were all the same but once I wore it in the pool to test I became a fan of Cressi. The mask is super soft, sticks to my face and the snorkel works better than my old one did.
customer_reviews.author: David Y.

customer_reviews.title: dont use this item
customer_reviews.text: I have been snorkeling and diving for 45 years and bought/used many types of masks and gear and am a professional in the industry. This mask is dangerous and I would srongly discourage ANYONE from ever using it as it imploded shattered inward on my daughters face at 5 feet of water. The mask glass is destroyed and luckily she was not blinded by shards. I am going to see if I can at least be refunded.
customer_reviews.author: Craig K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit, wide view
customer_reviews.text: + : the overall value for the cost, the material, the nice wide view, the comfort... - : if I have to find one thing, I'd say the silicone could be more flexible at the nose (equalizing), but it's not bothering either. I use it for scuba diving, in the sea and (unfortunately :D) in swimming pools too. So intensive use. Let's see how it resists the chemicals of the pools on long term. Had to burn the screen already 2 times, still keeps fogging. Again, it's normal for a new product.
customer_reviews.author: Emese KORE

customer_reviews.title: Great mask, snorkel not so much....
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the mask, it's low volume, doesn't squish your face and dosn't let water in. However I HATE the snorkel, it lets waster in the bottom EVERY time I use it, its' practically useless. I'm no snorkel expert but it is so uncomfortable to use. So pretty much just bought this for the mask, can't return it since it's so close to my cruise :/
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: These fit me great and I have a very small head. My husband has a huge head and has same size and they fit him great too. We did end until burning out the inside and when I use baby shampoo mixed w water...no digging up at all. We have de fogging stuff we both get but the baby shampoo mix works better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice design but fogs to easily.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice design but fogs way to easily. With my old mask I could just spit on it and I was good to go. That does not work with this mask so I had to switch to baby shampoo (to keep from fogging) and now it's fine. Overall a bit of a pain for an otherwise very nicely designed mask.
customer_reviews.author: StriperGuy

customer_reviews.title: Bahamas
customer_reviews.text: Snorkeled every day in the Bahamas and they held up well with no leaks and the snorkel is sensitive so it keeps salt water out of the tube. Hint: Buy antifog.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Cressi Scuba Diving Snorkeling Freediving Mask Snorkel Set
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I particularly like the clear silicon on the tube and mask, which makes it easy to keep hygienically clean. Fits very nicely to facial contour with no leakage and comfortable to wear. The trick is to make the head band as loose as possible and not have any water intrusion. What the manufacturer does not tell you, or at least I didn't get a booklet, was how to adjust the band. The two little opposing buttons on the strap retainer have to be pushed in, which loosens the clamp that holds the strap. This bit of information is not self-evident, and it took a little playing around to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: John Dinger

customer_reviews.title: Great diving mask.  No fogging issues after lighter trick.  Great dry snorkel.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best diving mask I've used, and also the best snorkel I've used! Before I took it on vacation, I used a lighter to burn away the thin film of manufacturing residue on the glass. When coated with a bit of shampoo + water, I had no issues with fogging.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Sedmak

customer_reviews.title: My own personal dry snorkel.
customer_reviews.text: Very good snorkeling equipment. I used it to snorkel in the sea at half moon cay. I took me a while to get used to it because I had never snorkeled before. The guide told me that i have a really good dry snorkel and i should definitely be okay. I liked that I purchased my own and didnt have to use other peoples snorkel equipment. I had a blast and with minimum salt in my mouth, until i panicked, opened my mouth wide open and swallowed a half a cup of salt water lol.
customer_reviews.author: Seriously08

customer_reviews.title: Extra rubber piece would be great.
customer_reviews.text: Love the carrying case. It would be great if they included extra rubber piece for the end of the snorkel. We bought 3 and one lost the bottom rubber piece for the snorkel so it was unusable. They worked great for first time snorkelers. Used for age 14 and 2 adults.
customer_reviews.author: The Savings Wife

customer_reviews.title: Mask Fogs Up Even After Treating with Baby Shampoo, etc.
customer_reviews.text: I was really hopeful after reading all of the positive reviews on this mask & the brand in general. That said, I am very disappointed. I just returned from Maui and ended up borrowing a different mask due to excessive fogging issues. Not only did it fog up terribly, but it was really uncomfortable around the back of the head. The snorkel portion of the set worked just fine, but without a functioning mask it's useless.
customer_reviews.author: MKT

customer_reviews.title: Best mask I ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: I always had great respect for Cressi. Their material and workmanship are top notch. This frameless silicone mask is very light, puts very little pressure on my face and leaves no marks on my face. Because it is clear, there is plenty of light and visibility is great because of the oversize lenses. The dry snorkel eliminates the continuous need to blow out water on surfacing and the mouth piece fits very comfortably in my mouth. Also the snorkel is fitted with a very practical clip system which makes it super easy to attach and detach it from the mask strap. Finally, the price is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Gadgetman

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for us!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for a cruise to the Caribbean, and they worked great. The fit probably wasn't perfect according to how you're supposed to test for fit, but for us (who were just going to snorkel a couple times for less than an hour at a time), they were just fine. I *really* like the quick attach/detach mechanism, and the gizmo held on to the strap itself never came loose or undone; I had to buy a third snorkel set of a different brand (National Geographic label) while on the ship and its equivalent gizmos worked very poorly, and that made me appreciate this Cressi set even more.
customer_reviews.author: Homeschooling mom

customer_reviews.title: OK mask - amazing snorkel
customer_reviews.text: The mask is hard to seal around my face. Often lets water in and I have to clear it. The snorkel on the other hand is pretty amazing. It really does seal when you dive. You don't have to clear it as it keeps all water out. I rated this for the mask. If I rated the snorkel that would get five stars.
customer_reviews.author: some dude

customer_reviews.title: Work well!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to replace an aging pair. These worked well. The glass does fog due to temperature and moisture, but the items work well.
customer_reviews.author: Golfman1867

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves her new mask!
customer_reviews.text: All the Cressi masks have been awesome! I have a full beard, and it fits great with minimal leaking. This mask not only fit me as an adult but my 7 year old daughter as well who absolutely loves her pink mask, snorkel and strap cover! Added the Neoprene Strap covers to all the cressi masks we purchased and the whole family is happy!
customer_reviews.author: Ocala Website Designs LLC

customer_reviews.title: Better for smaller faces than larger ones
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for my face. 6’ 1” male - slightly larger than average face. Could not get a good seal. However, fit 15 yr old son very well, did not have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Prison Mike

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: great goggles for our snorkeling trip. did not leak with a solid days worth of use and abuse. the snorkel is great for beginners and experienced divers alike. valve prevents a lot of water from getting in and is easy to blow excess water out. very happy with this purchase. would reccommend treating these with some kind of de-fogger prior to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin C

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more an get this one!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Pay a little more and get this one, totally worth it, easy to use, I also bought the strap covers for extra comfort and for my wife’s hair to not get ripped out!
customer_reviews.author: Josiah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mask and snorkel!
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these, one for myself and one for a friend. We both loved them! We had no problems with mask leakage, and the snorkel made it so easy to dive down and get closer looks at underwater life without feeling like a drowned rat each time. The mask did fog up a lot for me, but I feel like that's due to me not giving it adequate treatment (eg, baby shampoo or anti-fog drops) rather than anything inherent in the mask itself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One flaw
customer_reviews.text: The mask is great. The only complaint is that the description states 'Mask comes with a protective mask box'. I got nothing but a non-reusable plastic bag.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Good visibility and comfort, but leaks a bit
customer_reviews.text: These look small in your hand, but on my giant face, they're pretty great. The sit close to your eyes, so you barely see any frame. The silicon is very soft, which makes for a comfortable fit but does let in some water. Snorkel is great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rushin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic snorkle and mask set
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic snorkle and mask set. I purchased one for my wife before our honeymoon to the Caribbean and ended up getting another for myself because I liked hers so much. I have a decent amount of snorkelling/diving experience and love this
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: It is great. You will have to burn off the film ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son, he is 11 with a quality size face. It is great. You will have to burn off the film on the otherwise it will fog up like crazy. You Tube how to do it. Truthfully....the snorkel is just amazing!! The snorkel is better than my expensive one...I am jealous.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for ne
customer_reviews.text: Cute and very comfortable and clear, but leaked on top. I wanted to make it work but it’s just not for my face.
customer_reviews.author: Gabbie

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I live on the beach in Costa Rica, so my snorkel gear gets a lot of use. I've tried many different snorkels, and this is the best you're likely to find for the money. The quality and comfort is superb. I honestly expect this kit to last 10 years or more.
customer_reviews.author: James Irons

customer_reviews.title: is easily adjusted and has a great range for viewing
customer_reviews.text: Once I got this mast adjusted for my small head they work really well! I rarely had any water come in the mask while snorkeling. It fits really well, is easily adjusted and has a great range for viewing. The snorkel tube works really well too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than Others
customer_reviews.text: Our last trip to the Virgin Islands, I bought a snorkel set from Target but had serious problems with the both the snorkel and mask leaking. I returned those as soon as we got back. Before the most recent trip, I checked Amazon and found this set deeply discounted, so I figured I'd take a chance based on the other positive reviews. This time, the set worked wonderfully - no leaks from either the snorkel or mask. Both were comfortable and I can't wait to use them again. I'm going to pick up another set for my wife and her aunt, who were jealous of these.
customer_reviews.author: Craig H.

customer_reviews.title: Mask fits very nicely and is pretty water tight
customer_reviews.text: Mask fits very nicely and is pretty water tight. I have only used it myself so I cannot say how well it would fit my wife but I have a suspicion it will fit her just as well. The snorkel works as advertised when diving and does not require purging. I had previously purchase a snorkel by itself that was more expensive than this snorkel/mask combination so this is really a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: shakyacres

customer_reviews.title: Awesome snorkeling set!
customer_reviews.text: This is as good as was described I bought one for my husband, mother on law and 8 and 12 years old boys. I haven't swam so long until I bought this. I will certainly enjoy swimming more in the pool and in the ocean beach. I definitely like the fact that I can dive and not get water in the tube and continue breathing by having the snorkel come up for air. The tempered glass makes the goggle stay clear. The mask is like a vacuum and sucks right into your face. Just adjust it to fit to you. It came with a nice bag to put everything in. Nice addition to our water activities!
customer_reviews.author: Mum

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Goggles fogged up every time, which is ok I guess, but then they lost suction and water started to leak in. Thehe snorkel stopped working after 2 days, which is not a pleasent experience.
customer_reviews.author: ILir

customer_reviews.title: Defective. Snorkel vacation with no working snorkel.
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed in our purchase. We purchased 3 sets for a trip to the beach and realized as soon as we got in the water that 2/3 sets were missing the valve at the back of the mouthpiece making them worthless. Cheaply made and not at all quality. Purchased this set due to the reputation and quality and was very disappointed - not to mention out of luck at the beach with a defective snorkel. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: mhearts

customer_reviews.title: Great masks
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these masks for our trip to Turks and Caicos and overall, were happy with this product. Make sure to cover the entire inside of the mask with toothpaste (rub it in) then rinse it out before using. This will keep it from getting foggy while in use. We used these masks daily for an entire week and only had one issue with the snorkel (stopped working), but after moving some of the pieces around (my husband did this), it started working again. Only problem was that we were pretty far out and I couldn't breathe. Other than that one issue, we liked the masks.
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to see the fishies
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect for daily swims while on Vaca in Maui and now back home perfect for the lap pool. Seems a very forgiving fit as I passed it around to family and friends and it worked for all of us.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Leaks & fogs no matter what
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Leaks, fogs. Did a refresher course and fought with this mask for the first half. Every exhale through the regulator and it let water in. Finally just kept my hand on it until a break and borrowed another one, which worked fine. Too late to return, huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: RRB52

customer_reviews.title: A product like this shouldn't only last an hour in the water
customer_reviews.text: Awful. I de-fogged my mask with baby shampoo, and the mask would still fog up. The snorkle stopped working after a mile of swimming along a reef in South Florida, and I missed out on killer experiences with baby turtles. A product like this shouldn't only last an hour in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Simply design with good functionality
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Perhaps you might need to burn the glass for its first use since it's not fully anti-foggy in my case. No worries, silicon will not burn.
customer_reviews.author: Sungtaek HAN

customer_reviews.title: Great Value & Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Matches description perfectly and the quality ensures that it will be used for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: James Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great item and nice price
customer_reviews.text: Really nice mask and snorkel. Got in about 4 hours so far and really love the equipment. I did the lighter, toothpaste and baby shampoo treatment to the mask and had no fogging at all. The soft silicone on the mask is comfortable and the snorkel mouthpiece was never fatiguing. I did the research and can tell you not to waste any more time. Buy this one and enjoy your snorkeling experience!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Schalk

customer_reviews.title: Love this combo
customer_reviews.text: The mask is so comfortable with the silicone which also makes it air tight. Love the feel of it and am looking forward to trying it in water! I also really like the glass lens which makes visibility crystal clear. Haven't tried either item yet but from my observations they should work great. Looking forward to snorkeling in Mexico in November.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley K

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I saw a lot of reviews that said the mask fogs up and this is true after having for a couple of weeks, but I leave it outside in the elements and it does not fog up when I dive more then a couple of feet deep. It is not a heavy for and I can still see out of it, I will be using some rain x on it to clean it to keep it from fogging up anymore. I have had more then on snorkel mask and this is the best for the money so far.
customer_reviews.author: jims

customer_reviews.title: Best mask ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great mask! We are into snorkeling, so owned and rented variety of equipment. Never had such a great ffitting mask, and with a huge field of view! The fit is just perfect for both my husband who usually needs larger masks, and for my smaller face. I have just ordered another one for myself. I mostly struggle with masks due to my narrow face, but this one is amazingly soft and well-sealing around any face. No problem with this model! The snorkel is good, too.
customer_reviews.author: good food's friend

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Good no drips. The snorkel mounts a little strange and will dip into the water if you don't pay attention. I thought I would get clear ones so I could see more naturally and not feel confined. And that works but not a good idea in clear water on a bright day. These are meant more for dark water. I had to put my hand up to block the light.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Black

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable Mask
customer_reviews.text: These masks are maybe the most comfortable I've ever tried. Seriously, a great fit and effective water seal; I feel like I don't even need the strap sometimes. But...I would describe the field of vision as...good (not great and not horrible). As for removing the film on the inside of the glass, I learned a trick from an old time diver. This sounds whacky but it totally works: burn the inside of the glass with a bbq lighter until the film turns black. I did this for 20 seconds, wiped it down with a towel, and I was done. (Photo is of the masks post burn and bath.)
customer_reviews.author: matt nevis

customer_reviews.title: no leaks, some fog
customer_reviews.text: Beginner snorkeler - great mask, no leaks, except for when I laughed under water, which was expected. Snorkel worked as intended, went under water with it, no salt water mouth. It did fog pretty bad, but that's probably user error. Someone at the resort where we vacationed said you can try using a jetdry type gel on the inside of the mask and wash it out pretty well, and it should prevent fogging for a few trips. I'll have to try that next time.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Fogged up, otherwise comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Like the product, like the bag it comes in. Only issue is that the steam up right on first use. Will get something to defog.. but shouldn’t have to I wouldn’t have thought on first use.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: but it isn't really better or worse than any others on that point
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hoping claims of not fogging up were true, but it isn't really better or worse than any others on that point. Other than that I really like it. It is very comfortable, it does not leak, and it looks to be very high quality. Happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to spearfishing and bought this set so that I could go out fishing around jetties and docks with by buddy on the coast. The snorkel is very impressive -- well built and the splashguard does a great job keeping water out when a wave or some spray comes overhead. The mask is great as well. Very soft/pliable rubber surround that seals to my face. Haven't had any problems with leaking, and the soft nose piece makes it easy to clear my ears. The strap adjusment locks are also a breeze to use and the snorkel has a cool easy-on/easy-off clip that allows you to detach it from the mask very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: DIY snorkeling--No "excursions" required
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these masks in advance of a trip to Puerto Rico with the whole family this summer. I'm so glad we did. We ended up doing a ton of "on our own" snorkeling and didn't end up doing any special trips/excursions (saving all kinds of $$) because we were able to see so much just swimming along the beaches. We would have missed many special moments without these. Bonus: they're incredibly comfortable and easy to use. My 12-year-old son had never snorkeled before and he was diving like a pro within minutes.
customer_reviews.author: R.R.

customer_reviews.title: I'm order another when I wear mine out
customer_reviews.text: LOVE. My husband and I got these (he obviously got black and I got pink). But, they're great for snorkeling and diving. Easy masks to clear and don't get fogged up too fast. Sometimes it'll get foggy but that's normal.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleonahe

customer_reviews.title: Foggy
customer_reviews.text: Very foggy in the center even with using anti-fog. Comfortable mask though and snorkel works good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing BUT *needs pretreatment for fogging*
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect! There is a film on them that has to be removed prior to use or it will fog like crazy. Using a non gel toothpaste and a lighter did the trick (google and YouTube to see what to do exactly). This is standard for all new tempered glass masks. The film is protective until it arrives for use. Zero fogging issues after appropriate pretreatment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got a total of 5 uses and began leaking
customer_reviews.text: I used this mask 5 times in the last year and now its leaking. The reviews I read for this product were great and long lasting material. I can safely say it's not or o was sold a defective item. Will not be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Zuesss

customer_reviews.title: nice mask
customer_reviews.text: had trouble getting the fit right because it kept fogging up. Bought a bottle of anti fog solution and tightened the straps well and it worked fine after that. Snorkel is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Frank Deering

customer_reviews.title: Best snorkel we have used.
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, did not leak, was able to keep out water being towed behind a Hobie-cat in the ocean... soft and comfortable seal around your face.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Thompson

customer_reviews.title: The best mask and snorkel I have tried
customer_reviews.text: Super quality, super design, very happy with these goggles and snorkel. They work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Wise Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, easy to use, pack and carry everywhere. Loved snorkeling with this!
customer_reviews.author: beamsago

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe this is Cressi quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take with me to Mexico. While out snorkeling the snorkel stopped working. It ruined my paid for $50 excursion. When I got home I checked and it's stuck. I won't take it again so a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Beachin06

customer_reviews.title: Great Product- Good Idea
customer_reviews.text: I am soooo glad I bought these for our vacation. Fit great, good quality, no leaks. Also, I was happy to have my own gear - especially when I saw what the guide provided to others. I would not want to put that old - used equipment in my mouth. Also, I noticed some people using the guides equipment on the trip had problems with leaks...
customer_reviews.author: Yamy!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, never fogs or leaks
customer_reviews.text: This is the only mask I’ve ever used that never leaked and never fogged (I use antifog spray too). I have a small and narrow face and this mask fits perfectly. The snorkel itself is more malleable than usual which makes it more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Marcella Mack

customer_reviews.title: Customer service?
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could get a reply from customer service! I need anew purge valve and I don’t know what size to buy for this snorkel. Tried contacting Cressi twice.
customer_reviews.author: Stacerella

customer_reviews.title: Fake reviews on this itom
customer_reviews.text: I recommend not to buy it. First time I used it for 5 minutes and it started leaking. I know sometimes you need to find right mask for your face, but I also had friends with me that tried on and it still leaked. And also I would anti-gel and it would only work for about 10 minutes. And honestly I think review that are with 5 stars on this itom is fake. My snorkel review is 4 star.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Took it for a Swim. Nice Mask
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mask and snorkel. I used this in a lagoon off Little Egg Harbor in NJ, and the fit was perfect, even for my large head (based on having issues with standard hats). Good visibility. If you get fogging, just apply some baby shampoo on the glass, swish it around and then rinse. No need to buy an anti-fogging spray.
customer_reviews.author: Joe from Philly

customer_reviews.title: overall my girlfriend and i were pretty happy with this set
customer_reviews.text: decided to go out snorkeling for our first time so i bought a set of mask and snorkel. at first the dry snorkel was not working due to some piece getting stuck. However, once we got it free this snorkel kept water out very well. The mask started to fog but i guess that should somewhat be expected. All you need is a little bit of quick spit and that should help the mask from fogging. overall my girlfriend and i were pretty happy with this set.
customer_reviews.author: abraham contreras

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, durable and well liked by all in our family of 6
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a trip to Cabo. It worked great. Not just for adults but our 9 year old daughter as well. There were kids and adults of all ages using this over 7 days and every one liked it. Plus its still in great shape.. I had expected the strap to break or some damage due to the amount of use the kids were giving it but its still in great shape. So much cheaper then renting used snorkel gear..
customer_reviews.author: Daniele Grigsby

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Worked well on my trip to Gulf Shores. I used it to search around in the surf for interesting finds.
customer_reviews.author: Bump

customer_reviews.title: No leaks good item
customer_reviews.text: Really nice scuba gear at a good price. No complaints even without the baby shampoo it doesn’t fog up enough to even see. No leaks and surfacing or go under completely the tube does the job no water in the tube
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Cressi Scuba Diving Snorkeling Kit - Freediving Mask & Dry Snorkel | F1 & Supernova Dry: Designed in Italy
product_meta.description: Looking for a Great Mask and Snorkel Package? Cressi has a great little package for you!CSBFM Cressi Frameless Mask:Frameless masks are loved by many divers for their low-profile and ability to fold flat for easy carrying, even in a BCD pocket. Cressi's Frameless Mask design bonds a high-grade silicone double feathered edge skirt directly to a single tempered glass lens for the ultimate in simplicity. The low internal volume allows for effortless clearing and the quick adjust strap buckles are molded directly into the skirt for a flexible fit and reduced drag. The easy access nose pocket can be used with one hand for proper ear equalization and the single lens design affords a wide field of vision. The Cressi Frameless Mask has a wide split mask strap design for comfort and to give even tension on the skirt for a proper seal. Mask comes with a protective mask box.CSBSDDWH Cressi Supernova Dry Snorkel:The Supernova Dry Snorkel has an anti-splash end with a special valve that seals the tube as you dive, almost totally preventing the entrance of water when the snorkel is submerged. The lower end has a corrugated section that has a smooth internal bore which prevents trapping water inside the snorkel tube allowing excess water to quickly drain to the collection reservoir below. The corrugated section also quickly drops away from the diver's mouth when switching from the snorkel to the Scuba regulator.The special water collectio
feature_bullets: Frameless mask with single lens design, tempered glass lens for extra durability.
Ultra clear lens for vivid colors, soft and comfortable mask skirt, low volume design. It features push button buckle for easy strap adjustments, wide field of vision.
Dry top design snorkel, anti-splash top, special valve seals tube when submerged.
Corrugated smooth bore lower tube, quick release snorkel keeper, easy clear purge valve.
The F1 & Supernova Dry is designed in Italy by Cressi and made in Taiwan. Cressi has been an Italian brand pioneer in scuba diving, snorkeling, and swimming equipment since 1946.
